vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὑποζώννῡμι
(infinitive ὑποζωνύναι in [Refs] and ὑποζωννύω [Refs 2nd c.BC+], undergird, τοὺς ἵππους ῥυτῆρσι [Refs 1st c.AD+]; ὁ ὑπεζωκὼς τὰς πλευράς (i.e. ὑμήν), or absolutely ὁ ὑπεζωκώς, the pleura, [Refs 2nd c.AD+] is expressed in [Refs 2nd c.AD+]; ὑπεζωκότες foetal membranes, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]; lining of the intestines, [Refs 4th c.AD+] —passive, especially in perfect participle, ζειρὰς ὑπεζωμένοι (variant {-ζωσμ-}) girt with ζειραί (which see), [Refs 5th c.BC+] (οι) girt up, [Refs 5th c.BC+] —especially,
__II brace a ship, so as to make her seaworthy [NT+2nd c.BC+]
__III ὑπεζῶσθαι· τὸ εἰς ἄνδρας ἐλθεῖν, Φιλητᾶς, [Refs 5th c.AD+] (probably = come to man's estate).
vocabInfos.mediumDef: to gird under, of persons; to undergird, brace a ship with cables, chains, etc., Acts 27:17*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: ceñir, ligar o reforzar (un barco con cables durante una tormenta)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 從底層加固
1a) 把船隻並排的捆綁在一起: 亦即用帶子或纜索,
使船隻能平安渡過狂浪和大風暴 (徒 27:17)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 从底层加固
1a) 把船只并排的捆绑在一起: 亦即用带子或缆索,
使船只能平安渡过狂浪和大风暴 (徒 27:17)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: ràng thắt; buộc chặt (một con tàu). ὑπό (G5259) và ζώννυμι (G2224). (Hapax)
